title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Patient Safety Team-Based Simulation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Through effective team communication, learners identify patient safety-related risk situations with over 80% accuracy.
After role-playing simulation scenarios, learners derive at least three improvement points through reflective discussions.
Learners apply patient safety protocols based on international safety standards (NSQHS) to real-world cases.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
